text: Ej Pajomʙar, hargiz dar on masçid namoz maguzor. Masçide, ki az rūzi naxust ʙar parhezgorī ʙunjod şud va on (masçidi Rasuli Alloh) şoistatar ast, ki dar on ço namoz guzorī. Dar on ço mardone hastand, ki dūst dorand az naçosathovu palidiho va az gunohhovu ma'sijatho pokiza ʙoşand, zero Alloh pokizagonro dūst dorad
